itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, September 10, 2013
contentencoded:
Should American tax dollars support medical schools located outside the United States? In a recent academic year, students at three Caribbean medical schools received $470 million in federally-backed student loans. Janet Lorin, higher education reporter at Bloomberg, investigated this in the October issue of Bloomberg Markets Magazine. She joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
